long_description: Essential gear for backcountry first aid, the Sawyer SAM Splint Protection Kit includes everything you need to splint a bone, packed in a compact, lightweight kit that's easy to carry. Kit includes 2 finger splints, 1 regular splint, athletic wrap, tape strips, reference cards and training DVD. Splints feature an aluminum alloy core sandwiched between two layers of closed-cell foam; splints affix with athletic wrap or tape. Measuring 36 x 4.5 in., the Sawyer SAM regular splint can fit nearly any bone while folding up small enough to fit in most first aid kits. Finger splints are perfect for finger or toe sprains. Splints wipe clean and are reusable.
short_description: Essential gear for backcountry first aid, the Sawyer SAM Splint Protection Kit includes everything you need to splint a bone, packed in a compact, lightweight kit that's easy to carry.
